また、新要素を追加する度に致命的な不具合も追加。かつ対応が遅い。

Лучший симулятор диктатуры! 12 из 10. 
Игра с симуляцией реального государства! Уже на данном этапе создан свод правил, которому должен следовать каждый!
В нем вы встретите такие правила как:
- Из двух выживших выбирай того, который не ранен и ещё не висел;
- Не бери Ноед, Гибель Франклина, Закрытие дальних генераторов, Осколок, Адреналин и ещё тысяча и один перк, так как дизбаланс. 
- Если ливнул один сурв, то ты должен отпустить остальных
- Фонариком не свети
- Не блокируй маньяка
- Крюки не ломай
- Тотемы тоже
- Ловушки и порталы не обезвреживай
- Досками не оглушай
- Не занимайся Кемпом
- Вообще не ходи возле
- Желательно уйди в другой конец карты
- Если осталось два сурва и один при смерти, то подними его, чтобы другой сбежал в люк
- Не используй Медсестру, Духа и других убийц. Разрешён только Каннибал, но не забывай, что кемпить нельзя
- Если ты застелсил 5 генераторов и открыл ворота, то обязательно сядь в них и поприседай, чтобы убийца понял, что он унижен профессионалом 
- Если тебя быстро поймал и убил маньяк, то обязательно напиши, что просто спаун досок и окон плохой, а также убийца багоюзер
И это лишь малая часть! Приглашаем всех fucking slaves к нам в Dungeon!

好玩啊，日常上树看风景，我偷偷跟你讲喔，农场的风景辣是十分滴好看喔，搞了这么久，平时也就只能摸摸宝贝啊啥的，修电机系不会修滴，也不阔能修，还有哦，农场主超友善的，每次都扛着我们到处看风景喔，还不用我们自己走，你说好不好喔，我介意刚入坑滴小萌新啊，进去游戏什么都别管，就找个最靓最舒适柜子钻进去，还会有乌鸦来你介里做客，还会给你唱锅滴喔，那声音习分好听的，绝对不骗你，等它们唱完锅后，农场主就过来带你去看风景了，简级不要太乏算，赶紧购入游戏跟我们一起看风景吧。

(I will update this review often)

(This review was before the 6th Anniversary was a thing):

They're still trying to implement MMR into Mario Party so every game plays out the same being as un-interactive as possible for both sides most of the time, removing the charm of what made the game special.. a simple fun party game where anything could happen and allowed meme builds or perks to work which was all you needed in a game to be satisfied. Get ready for Dead Hard, DS, Unbreakable, CoH survivors and tunnely/toxic Nurse, Artist, Blight, Trickster, Bubba, etc. players to play in a complete un-fun way to increase an invisible rank number they can't see because the devs said it exists. Even a friend of mine gets Iri 1 graded survivors running these builds as a complete beginner so yeah good job BHVR your MMR you worked on did nothing and is many times worse than the old emblem system.

That's not the only problem so I'll list some other horrible problems the devs refuse to address or do anything about:

1) The worst grind I've personally experienced in a game ever. If you have all the content you need to put in hundreds to thousands of hours to unlock everyone's perks to share to everyone else.

2) I'd like to add as well.. y'know the MMR system they forced on the player base that no one asked for? Even the devs admitted it doesn't work properly and refuse to remove it and maybe make a ranked/casual mode if they wanna push this game more towards a competitive scene (even though that doesn't work for a number of reasons, mainly being this game has way too many factors and rng that's out of your control)

3) This game's power creep is shit, with each killer coming out following the pattern of being oppressive in a chase and not allowing you or the survivor to outplay each other. However you can say it's "balanced" because it takes them longer to down/hook it buys the team more time to do gens. But that's not fun and people on both sides end up not being satisfied at the end of a match.

4) The perks (which ties in with the grind) are all locked behind DLC and with over 21 chapters to buy it's a huge investment in money and time to finally start creating fun builds and experimenting with multiple killers. The shrine doesn't fix this at all as they get 4 random perks to add to the shrine weekly and some perks show up way more than others.

5) The community is full of entitlement and toxicity which doesn't help either. It's not as bad some other bigger games but it's still noticeable. It just creates a cycle as well since players who aren't happy take their anger out on other players and the process repeats (I used to be a part of this as well sadly, getting bullied by a team/SWF and then putting on certain perks/add-ons on a certain killer and playing to win in the most unfun way as possible on the next team who were just playing for fun. Same goes for as survivor back then when perks like DS were a lot stronger)

The game had a lot of potential in my eyes when I first started playing on console back in January, 2019 but with so many problems from most of the recently released killers, the devs refusing to address some perks and being stubborn with this MMR system they want to force on people, I don't see this game getting fixed in a timely manner anytime soon. I say let's see how this game ends up in a couple years.

(Update after the 6th Anniversary):

I have high hopes for this game again and its potential assuming the developers go with their word in the upcoming months. If so:

- This game's huge grind and progression will significantly better with the prestige rework
- We will finally get a giant perk rework overhaul to killers and survivors (40+ perks on each side)
- This game will finally include bots to practice on when trying to learn new killers, maps, etc. as well as for filling in when playing against friends for fun
- Streamer mode so streamers are more safe against hackers, stream snipers, etc.
- Improving matchmaking even more
- Giving more BP for playing a certain role that needs more players
- Giving more log-in bonuses, bloodrushes (BP multipliers when playing), boosted rift fragments (progression for battle passes)
- Being able to save perk builds and custom outfits
- Pretty certain they mentioned a casual/hardcore mode that's like an unrated/rated equivalent

There's a lot to look forward to and I'm happy BHVR nailed it this time around, a lot of problems stemming multiple years will be fixed. The only other big problem for this game is the paywall with so many chapters out now for original/licensed characters. I suggest picking that stuff up when it's on sale since getting everything plus the game off sale is a HUGE price. Hopefully by the end of the year I can keep this review positive.
